com.gemalto.idp.mobile.ui.secureinput

Class SecureInputDefaultSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gemalto.idp.mobile.ui.secureinput.SecureInputDefaultSettings

  • public final class SecureInputDefaultSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that defines the secure input default settings of SecureInputBuilderV2. For the default settings of SecureInputBuilder, please see SecureInputConstant
    Since:
    4.4

      • BUTTON_PRESS_VISIBILITY

        public static final boolean BUTTON_PRESS_VISIBILITY
        Default setting of visible effect (highlighted) when button being pressed.

        Note: For security reason, it's disabled by default. User won't be able to see the state change when the button is pressed.
        BUTTON_PRESS_VISIBILITY = false

        See Also:
